text: Uyo mabasa ake akaipa anoshongedzwa aonekere kwaari seakanaka (akafanana here neuyo ari panzira yakatwasuka)? Zvirokwazvo, Allah vanosiya uyo wavanoda kuti apengereke, zvekare votungamira wavanoda. Usazviparadze (Muhammad (SAW)) kana kuzvigumbura nekuda kwavo. Zvirokwazvo, Allah vanoziva zvose zvavanoita
